channel.title: history on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in history on Thoughts

item.title: Neat! Now maybe I can avoid those destroyers!
item.description: Ran across this site recently. Seems pretty cool. They’ve posted a copy of a declassified WWII US submarine manual (well, immediately following the war to be more exact), including scans of all the neat pictures/diagrams/etc and ocr’d text.
